shared.model.map

Class CatanMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.map.CatanMap

  • public class CatanMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the board game map of the Catan game
    Author:
    davidtaylor

      • CatanMap

        public CatanMap(java.util.List<Port> ports,
                java.util.Map<HexLocation,Hex> hexes,
                java.util.Map<EdgeLocation,Road> roads,
                java.util.Map<VertexLocation,MapStructure> structures,
                int radius,
                HexLocation robberLocation)
        Creates a map with the given ports, hexes, roads, structures, radius, and robber location.
        Parameters:
        ports - the list of ports in the map.
        hexes - the hexes in the map.
        roads - the roads in the map.
        structures - the structures in the map.
        radius - the radius of the map.
        robberLocation - the location of the robber in the map.

      • canPlaceSettlement

        public boolean canPlaceSettlement(PlayerIndex player,
                                  VertexLocation location,
                                  boolean allowDisconnected)
        Method that indicates whether a player has the ability to place a settlement in a certain location on the map
        Parameters:
        player - this will be the player placing the settlement.
        location - this will be the location of the settlement; must ensure that this space on the map is empty.
        allowDisconnected - unused currently.
        Returns:
        true if the location is vacant and at least two spaces away from another settlement otherwise returns false

      • buildSettlement

        public void buildSettlement(PlayerIndex player,
                            VertexLocation location)
        Builds a settlement for the given player at the given location.
        Parameters:
        player - the player who is building the settlement.
        location - the location where the settlement is being built.

      • forcePlaceSettlement

                                 VertexLocation location)
                          throws PlacementException
        Throws:
        PlacementException

      • canPlaceCity

        public boolean canPlaceCity(PlayerIndex player,
                            VertexLocation location)
        Method that indicates whether a player has the ability to place a city in a certain location on the map
        Parameters:
        player - this will be the player placing the city
        location - this will be the location of the city; must ensure that this space already has a settlement located their owned by this player
        Returns:
        true if there is a settlement at the specified location and it is owned by the player otherwise returns false

      • buildCity

        public void buildCity(PlayerIndex player,
                      VertexLocation location)
        Builds a city for the given player at the given location.
        Parameters:
        player - the player who is building the city.
        location - the location where the city is being built.

      • canPlaceRoad

        public boolean canPlaceRoad(PlayerIndex player,
                            EdgeLocation location,
                            boolean allowDisconnected)
        Method that indicates whether a player has the ability to place a city on a certain edge on the map
        Parameters:
        player - this will be the player placing the road
        location - this will be the edge location where the road will be placed; must ensure this space is empty on the map
        allowDisconnected - whether this road must be connected to a settlement/road to place. True only during the setup phase.
        Returns:
        true if the player owns a settlement or city at the neighboring vertex locations and there is no current road there. False otherwise

      • buildRoad

        public void buildRoad(PlayerIndex player,
                      EdgeLocation location)
        Builds a road for the given player at the given location.
        Parameters:
        player - the player who is building the road.
        location - the location where the road is being built.

      • canMoveRobber

        public boolean canMoveRobber(PlayerIndex player,
                             HexLocation location)
        Method that indicates whether a player has the ability to move a robber on a certain Hex
        Parameters:
        player - -- this will be the player placing the robber
        location - -- this will be the hex location where the robber will be placed; cannot place on water or where the robber already is
        Returns:
        boolean -- returns true if it is not moving to its current location and it is not a sea piece otherwise returns false

      • getNearbyVertices

        public java.util.List<VertexLocation> getNearbyVertices(EdgeLocation normalized)
        Gets the nearby vertices from an edge one distance away from the current road.
        Parameters:
        normalized - the normalized location of the edge.
        Returns:
        a list of vertices one distance away.
        Pre-Conditions:
        the location is normalized.
